alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; North Cass; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin; South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 2:14PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Aitkin, southern Cass and northern Crow Wing Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 213 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Motley, or 19 miles west of Brainerd, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pillager around 220 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Gull Lake, Pequot Lakes and Nisswa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. This storm may intensify. Monitor local NOAA Weather Radio, commercial radio, or television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Crow Wing; North Cass; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin; South Cass
